name: Grocery Rush
description:
Grocery Rush is a fast paced action filled game. Where you have to do your best to be able to complete your shopping list while avoiding furious customers, in the closing minutes of the supermarket.

You need to find the grocery item and bring it to the cashier.

Important! Pick up only what is essential.

Good Luck (:

Controls:

- WASD movement

- G to drop items

- 1 2 3 4 5 or mouse wheel to change selected inventory slot

- Mouse and click to punch/use weapons
